titles.title: BOWSER Act
BOWSER Act
Bringing Oversight to Washington and Safety to Every Resident Act
A bill to repeal the District of Columbia Home Rule Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Bringing Oversight to Washington and Safety to Every Resident Act or the BOWSER Act
This bill repeals the District of Columbia (DC) Home Rule Act one year after the bill's enactment. (The DC Home Rule Act provides a charter for the local government of the District of Columbia authorizing DC officials to legislate, conduct elections, and otherwise govern over local affairs.)
